summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBrighten and improve the appearance of skin discoloration with the Good Molecules Brightening & Dark Spots Bar.
details: DetailsKey Ingredients2% Tranexamic and Kojic Acids work quickly together to help improve the appearance of skin spots and discolorationOlive oil, Niacinamide, and antioxidant Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex help nourish and comfort the skinBenefitsHigh foaming soap-free mild cleansers keep your skin fresh and residue-freeItem 2630330How To UseWet the bar and massage into a creamy lather over your face and body. Rinse well and pat dry. For external use. Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsHydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Glycerin, Tranexamic Acid, Kojic Acid, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Niacinamide, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex (CI 75810), Maltodextrin.
how_to_use: Wet the bar and massage into a creamy lather over your face and body. Rinse well and pat dry. For external use. Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: Best product for dark spots
reviews.comments:
Lathers well and can see skin lightening 
Really enjoying this product

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Jus start using it a week now and I can see the results already I use it twice a day

reviews.headline: This stuff WORKS like magic
reviews.comments: For reference, i have always have back acne and scarring pretty severely. April of this year I had a major acne break out resulting in a ton of scarring. I bought this and have used religiously from April-August. I wish i could add pictures because my before and after reults speak for themselves!!!

reviews.headline: It's good!
reviews.comments: So I knew this bar worked when I noticed my usual body wash was out and I have these white scrubby gloves that were getting a bit dingy, I would rinse them out well but they somehow they would still dry stiff and grey over time. I started using this soap and the next day in the shower noticed how white my gloves were, they looked new. I trust this soap cleans and exfoliates away dead skin and leaves you baby soft. I like to leave the lather on my skin a little longer before rinsing off, just to make sure the ingredients have time to work.  I definitely notice a difference in my skin, it's brighter and my hyperpigmentation spots are disappearing.

reviews.headline: Review
reviews.comments: I wantes to get rid of my dark spots and acne in my back and it did nothing at all

reviews.headline: I recommend this product for anyone with dark blemishes
reviews.comments: Been using for 2 weeks can already see a difference will continue to use hopefully they will fade away

reviews.headline: Buy it!!
reviews.comments: As someone who has been struggling to find a product that actually leaves my skin feeling clean without breaking the bank, this has been a holy grail product - it not only cleanses but helps with redness and reduces the appearance of my acne when used regularly. I do double cleanse at night and combine this with the Good Molecules balm for best results.

reviews.headline: idk
reviews.comments: honestly...I haven't been using religiously...an being that the soap latter's so nicely i didn't feel like I needed to waste the whole bar so I been cutting an using as I go...once I buy new face products ill incorporate the soap with it an update my review

reviews.headline: Skin is so soft and subtle!
reviews.comments: Pleasantly surprised how well this soap has been working to reduce dark spots and blemishes. Just a little over 2 weeks and I have seen a noticeable difference and this soap makes my skin feel so soft!!!

reviews.headline: Brightening Glow!!!
reviews.comments: I don't know how I can explain this! Absolutely glowing!!! It gives my skin a brightening glow! I love it! It's an affordable price and WORTH IT!!! I'm literally obsessed with it! I will spread the word about this miracle beauty soap! Lol! Kudos to Good Molecules and thank you!!!

reviews.headline: Doesn't work
reviews.comments: It dodnt really do anything different , and i feel like i broke out more.

reviews.headline: not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: i tried using this as it was recommended on tiktok as being good for body acne, but it did nothing but break me out more. I thought it was just my skin purging at first but my skin has been much clearer after not using it.

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I have been using it almost for a month, and I've seen great results! It has made my skin look even in tone and less breakouts.

reviews.headline: Shocked
reviews.comments: Oh my,i was shocked by how this soap got rid of my blemishes in less than a week on my face and neck,all gone,ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³i topped it with the brightening serum and its Magic,buyin more,Absolutely!!!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I like the way the lather of the soap and how I can see the dark spots getting lighter.

reviews.headline: So far so good
reviews.comments: I saw this advertised on Facebook and decided to order it. I started using the bar on May 26, 2025.  It lathers up well and it leave the face very smooth and not dry. It is odorless which is a plus for me. I am hoping it will help fade the discoloration on my forehead.

reviews.headline: Do not buy if you have dry sensitive skin.
reviews.comments: This soap has completely dried my skin out, caused breakouts and burned my under eye. It even dried my hands out after use. I was not able to use it long enough to see results. It may work for someone that has non-sensitive oily, but not sensitive.

reviews.headline: Dark spots bar
reviews.comments: Made the appearance of my dark spots from previous acne very dull in a good way. Now to visibly see them I have to be under good lighting. Will be repurchasing!!!

reviews.headline: Dark spots bar
reviews.comments: Made the appearance of my dark spots from previous acne very dull in a good way. Now to visibly see them I have to be under good lighting. Will be repurchasing!!!

reviews.headline: I would most definitely buy this over and over again.
reviews.comments: I'm in love how it makes my face and body feels after each use.
